I think Tom Cruise is full of shit.. the sword fighting in that mvoie was all hollywood bull crap..  try looking for someone who teaches Iaido as well as kendo..

Wilson


--

--------- Original Message ---------
DATE: Sun, 11 Jan 2004 02:30:45
From: BMCAMP@...
To: samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com
Cc: 

Hello to all,

I am new to the group, but find the Samurai interesting and am reading 
everything I can.  My question has to do with modern studies of the Samurai 
techniques of swordmanship.  I have seen a few books about it, and even heard that Tom 
Cruise studied with a group out of New York City.  I would like to know where 
I could possibly learn the techniques learned by the Samurai.  I have not 
seen any Kendo teachers in my area.

Thanks,

Brett
